Change Log for OVal

Release History

Version Date Description

Release 1.87 – 2017-03-04

Type Changes By
Support for Java 8 java.time Dates in @Future and @Past (thanks to Pyeroh) Fixes github-5.
Improve performance of ValidateWithMethodCheck (thanks to an-bel) Fixes github-3.

Release 1.86 – 2016-10-08

Type Changes By
SpringInjector#initialize(Object)
Race condition when initializing ResourceBundleMessageResolver (thanks to Ville Koskela) Fixes 91.
Improve support for constraint target selection via JXPath
upgraded to AspectJ 1.8.9, BeanShell 2.0b6, OGNL 3.1.3, Spring 3.2.17.RELEASE

Release 1.85 – 2015-10-03

Type Changes By
Activation rules are not considered for whole contraints list (thanks to Petras) Fixes 90.
@Email validation treats + as invalid character (thanks to David van Geest) Fixes 85.
ConstraintTarget.RECURSIVE to specify the constraints should be applied recursively to nested maps/lists Limiting the nesting level for ConstraintTarget.VALUES (thanks to Petras) Fixes 89.
ResourceBundleMessageResolver fails to find a message in ResourceBundle of more generic Locale (thanks to Petras) Fixes 88.
concurrency fix in SerializableMethod/SerializableField/SerializableContructor (thanks to Andrew Malota)
DigitsCheck's validation message missing from Messages.properties file (thanks to Dirk Buchhorn)
DigitsCheck's message variables are emtpy (thanks to Dirk Buchhorn)
Trove is wrongly detected (thanks to Geert Bevin) Fixes 86.
upgraded to AspectJ 1.8.6, commons-logging 1.2, Groovy 2.2.2, OGNL 3.1, Paranamer 2.8, Rhino 1.7R5, Spring 3.2.14.RELEASE, SLF4J 1.7.12

Release 1.84 – 2013-11-22

Type Changes By
JPAAnnotationsConfigurer shouldn't add Checks twice Fixes 84.
LocaleProvider, ThreadLocalLocaleProvider, Validator.getLocaleProvider, Validator.setLocaleProvider
upgraded to Spring 3.2.5.RELEASE, Paranamer 2.6, xstream 1.4.5, OGNL 3.0.8

Release 1.83 – 2013-09-07

Type Changes By
added Validator.resolveValue methods
upgraded to Spring 3.2.4.RELEASE, Groovy 2.1.6, OGNL 3.0.7, Paranamer 2.5.7, SLF4J 1.7.5, commons-logging 1.1.3
small performance improvement in annotation processing in BeanValidationAnnotationsConfigurer
added net.sf.oval.integration.guice.GuiceCheckInitializationListener to support injection of Guice managed objects into constraint check implementations

Release 1.82 – 2013-01-26

Type Changes By
currentlyCheckingPreConditions in Guard.validateMethodPost Fixes 78.
made deprecated XML attribute "requireValidElements" of assertValid optional in XSD
Wrong generic types used in Check-implementations Fixes 79.
upgraded to AspectJ 1.7.1, JUnit 4.11, Log4J 1.2.17, SLF4J 1.7.2, XStream 1.4.4, Groovy 2.1.0, BeanShell 2.0b5, OGNL 3.0.6, JRuby 1.6.5, Rhino 1.7R4, Spring 3.2.0.RELEASE, Paranamer 2.5.2, GNU Trove 3.0.3
message variable cache invalidation on MatchPatternCheck NotMatchPatternCheck
JSR223 Scripting support Fixes 75.

Release 1.81 – 2012-02-22

Type Changes By
xstream alias typo "postExcecution" in XMLConfigurer.java Fixes 77.
UnsupportedOperationException when using inspectInterfaces Fixes 76.
default message attribute value on JSR303 annotations being misinterpreted
upgraded to Spring 3.1.1.RELEASE, AspectJ 1.6.12, JUnit 4.10, XStream 1.4.2, OGNL 3.0.4, CGLib 2.2.2, Groovy 1.8.6, commons-jexl 2.1.1, Paranamer 2.4.1
extended BeanValidationAnnotationsConfigurer to support method parameter constraints and return value checks on non-getter methods

Release 1.80 – 2011-10-03

Type Changes By
upgraded to AspectJ 1.6.11, OGNL 3.0.2, JRuby 1.6.4, Groovy 1.8.2, XStream 1.4.1, Rhino 1.7R3, Spring 3.0.6.RELEASE, Javolution 5.5.1
added caching of compiled OGNL expressions
added caching of compiled MVEL expressions
message attribute on JSR303 annotations being ignored
removed deprecated AssertValid.requireValidElements attribute
removed deprecated class CheckWithMultiple
added support for target attribute on constraint annotations

Release 1.70 – 2011-04-05

Type Changes By
upgraded to AspectJ 1.6.10, Paranamer 2.3, MVEL 2.0.19, Spring 3.0.5.RELEASE, Commons JEXL 2.0.1, OGNL 3.0.1, Groovy 1.7.6
OVal fails to load at bean creation time Fixes 70.
Bug in DigitsCheck Fixes 71.
Bug while retrieving profile names from JSR group Fixes 72.
added convenience constructors to XMLConfigurer for easier Spring-based configuration
added support for Spring dependencies being injected into SimpleCheck instances
Missing sources JAR for OVal in Maven repository Fixes 73.
small XSD improvements

Release 1.61 – 2010-11-13

Type Changes By
@NotBlank ignores non-breaking space Fixes 69.
@EMail not validating addresses correct if allowPersonalName=true

Release 0.1alpha – 2005-08-17

Type Changes By
initial release
